data.name: Falling Bullets
data.detailed_description:
Falling Bullets - Start your adventure in the tank, which you can defeat tens, hundreds and even thousands of players. The gameplay focuses on rivalry in armored battles between players from around the world in PvP interactions. Falling Bullets are preserved in a cartoon and friendly atmosphere.

Key Features:

    - Very good looking maps
    - Addictive gameplay
    - Multiplayer mode
    - No pay2win (I too hate that)
    - Early Access
    - English language support

Mode List

    - Deathmatch
    - Team Elimination

Come back for more soldiers, because we win the war! Woo-hoo!

data.short_description: Start your adventure in the tank, which you can defeat tens, hundreds and even thousands of players. The gameplay focuses on rivalry in armored battles between players from around the world in PvP interactions. Falling Bullets are preserved in a cartoon and friendly atmosphere.
data.reviews:
“Multiplayer strategy with a variety of cards, fun gameplay, multiple game modes, nice graphics and sound. It is in early access, but gives good hopes.”
Recommended – Gaming Grandma

“Falling Bullets is a fun online tank battle game with very good looking maps and upgrades for stronger attacks.”
Recommended – Cheating Is Bad Mmmkaayy

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7/8/10
  • Processor: Dual Core
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 560 2GB, AMD Radeon 7850 2GB
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 3 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Macintosh® OSX 10.8+
  • Processor: 2 GHz Dual Core
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: nVidia® 8800 GT / AMD® 4670 or faster
  • Storage: 3 GB available space

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04+
  • Processor: 2 GHz Dual Core
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: nVidia® 8800 GT / AMD® 4670 or faster
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
